scripts.vendor:supabase: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const p=path.join(process.cwd(),'node_modules','@supabase','supabase-js','dist','umd','supabase.js');const out=path.join(process.cwd(),'vendor','supabase.min.js');if(!fs.existsSync(p)){console.error('Run npm install first.');process.exit(1);}fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(out),{recursive:true});fs.copyFileSync(p,out);console.log('Copied supabase.js to vendor/supabase.min.js');"
